Package main

Class FarmLand

java.lang.Object
main.FarmLand
public class FarmLand extends Object
The FarmLand is the playing area of the game. It contains a 2D array of tiles

  • Constructor Details

    • FarmLand

      public FarmLand(int height, int length, Farmer farmer, String farmName, File rockstatus) throws Exception
      Creates a FarmLand object
      Parameters:
      height - the height of the farm's tiles
      length - the length of the farm's tiles
      farmer - the farmer who owns and operates the farm
      farmName - the name of the farm
      rockstatus - the scattering configuration of the rocks
      Throws:
      Exception - if one of the seeds inside the seedList is not found

      Prints the list of actions available to the player
      Returns:
      A string containing all valid characters for the player to input

      public Report endDay()
      Ends the day and updates the status of all crops on the farm
      Returns:

      Parameters:

      sc - the scanner object used to get input from the player
      Returns:
      the result of the action taken

    • moveFarmer

      public Report moveFarmer(int x, int y)
      Changes the farmer's position to the specified tile
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate of the tile
      y - the y coordinate of the tile
      Returns:
      the context of the move

    • upgradeFarmer

      public Report upgradeFarmer()
      Upgrades the farmer's type based on the farmer's current type
      Returns:
      true if the upgrade was successful, only false if the farmer is already legendary
